abstract: Five-month-old boy Mason Barrientos and 2-week-old girl Rivka Ruvinov die in separate incidents in New York City.
lead_paragraph: A 5-month-old boy was found dead in Washington Heights in Manhattan on Thursday morning, and 2-week-old girl was found dead in the Kensington section of Brooklyn at about the same time, the authorities said.
snippet: A 5-month-old boy was found dead in Washington Heights in Manhattan on Thursday morning, and 2-week-old girl was found dead in the Kensington section of Brooklyn at about the same time, the authorities said.

headline.main: Two Infants Die in New York in Unrelated Episodes
headline.print_headline: Two Infants Die in Unrelated Episodes
